overview: Transport yourself back to an ancient time when men were heroes and demigods. The Golden Age of the Champion, when magic and myth were still alive and lust was not a sin. Marvel at the virile athletic form celebrated as living art in the stunning, hedonistic Raging Stallion feature, ‘ERECTUS’. Male sexual desire kept the ceremonial flame forever burning and director Steve Cruz invites you to the orgies of Ancient Rome in his monumental interpretation of the sexual appetites of Herculean men. He assembles a cast of seven godlike studs whose physiques and sex drives haven’t been equaled since the times of Sodom and Gommorrah.  Prepare yourself for the godly physiques, visceral intensity, and masculine passion of ‘ERECTUS.’
title: Erectus
